scripts.start: concurrently -n fe,be "yarn run sd:fe" "wait-on http://localhost:3003 && yarn run sd:be"
scripts.build: cd frontend && yarn run build && cd ../backend && yarn run build && cd .. && yarn run open
scripts.extract-build: rm -rf ./extracted-build && npx asar extract  backend/dist-electron/mac-arm64/TODO\ TODAY.app/Contents/Resources/app.asar extracted-build && open ./extracted-build
scripts.fill-it: yarn && cd backend && yarn && cd ../frontend && yarn
